p: The lawsuit was filed because the city, through the General Coordination of Human Resources, issued an Official Notice (CVL/SUBSC/CGRH/CTNRH No. 04/2020) on March 18 th, 2020, establishing the rules to release employees from work due to the coronavirus, but had not, up to that time, commented on the employees hired by social organizations to provide health care in the city.
